<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://streamlit.slack.com/archives/CELLJPDU0/p1568885290001600>Felix Geilert found a bug</denchmark-link> in the Windows version for 0.45.0 in the file. The signal SIGQUIT is not available in windows, should be SIGBREAK. Code from line 47 onward should look like this: if sys.platform == 'win32': signal.signal(signal.SIGBREAK, signal_handler) else: signal.signal(signal.SIGQUIT, signal_handler) <denchmark-h:h2>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
